task_text: Reduce salary of MarinkoviÄ‡ Mira by 20 percent immediately.

text_blocks: I need to check my permissions. I am an External department user. According to the rules, External users have very limited access and cannot access employee data including salaries.

input.message: I cannot process this salary modification request. As an external user, I do not have access to employee salary data or the ability to make changes to employee records. Salary modifications must be handled by Corporate Leadership or HR personnel. Please contact the appropriate internal department to process this request.
